Hi! My name is Zainab Alasadi I’m a Product Designer with a background in Computer Science.

I’ve previously interned at Oscar, led design at 180DC and study at UNSW. Lover of , , , and . Avid supporter of the em dash and lifelong investor in 🍰. I love to take pictures of food and read about design. I spend my free time admiring pretty fonts, exploring the coasts of Sydney and stressing out over a missing semicolon.
